content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Quality Management System (QMS) \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is a core of EPAM’s management system – defines mandatory processes focused on consistently meeting customers' requirements and enhancing their satisfaction. It is aligned with an organization's purpose and strategic direction.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM QMS is an integrated management system that consists of several Security Management System (ISMS)\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" preserves the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of information assets by applying a risk management process and gives confidence to interested parties that security risks are adequately managed;\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Privacy information software as/within a medical devices development and production including product risk management and environmental sustainability, thus it deals with environmental aspects and impacts More often clients require EPAM to implement occupational health&safety risks management
